sentences.en: Law enforcement officials had definitively identified Blanco as a potential suspect.
sentences.cn: 执法官员明确认为布兰科是个可能的嫌疑犯。

sentences.en: I think, personally speaking, that we need some further research before we can definitively say whether it helps or not.
sentences.cn: 我认为，就我个人而言，我们需要进一步的研究才能确定这是否有帮助。

sentences.en: This is definitively not the case.
sentences.cn: 实际上完全不是这种情况。
